channel.title: Infamous Dream 718
channel.description:
[b][u]Welcome to Infamous Dream 718![/u][/b]
[img]http://i58.tinypic.com/11i00ib.gif[/img]
The staff and players of the Infamous Dream 718 community would love to welcome you to our toplist introduction page! We hope that you like what you see and decide to give our server a chance to become one of the best.
Make sure to check out the Forums as well!
Webclient: Click Here https://www.rspscoding.org/play/?server=Infamous%20Dream%2024/7%20Need%20Staff DL Client: Click Here https://mega.co.nz/#!wZ5UhCQK!AU3TIGPrtBMJgPLFy1nCwhNt8VUyNqvtEm1NQ94U8y0 Forums: Click Here http://infamousdream.enjin.com/ Guides: Click Here http://infamousdream.enjin.com/forum/m/20720735/viewforum/3916031
Here we are going to show you some features of the server.
[b][u]Bosses[/u][/b]
We offer a wide variety of common and unique bosses, we plan to add more bosses in the time to come so do not expect this to be the final list!
• Revenant Dragons - In deep wilderness rev cave. • Ganodermic Beasts • Mithril Dragons • Sea Troll Queen • Dagganoths • Glacors • Bandos GWD • Zamorak GWD • Saradomin GWD • Armadyl GWD • King Black Dragon • Queen Black Dragon • Kalphite Queen • Tormented Demons • Corporeal Beast • Nex
[b][u]More to come![/u][/b]
[b][u]Minigames & Quests[/u][/b]
• Lost City Quest • Dwarf Handcannon Quest • Undead Nightmare minigame • Fight Caves (5 Waves) • Fight Kiln (Full Waves) • Duel Arena • Castle Wars • Clan Wars • Barrows
[b][u]Extra Features[/u][/b]
• Staff Zone (Staff Only) • Donator Zone • Super Donator Zone • Extreme Donator Zone • Gambling Zone • Dicing Zone • Test Zone • Dice Gambling • Flower Gambling • Dungeoneer Gambling • Custom Dungeoneering • Custom Slayer • Special Ranks • Special Forum Badges • Max Cape • Completionist Cape • Skiller Cape • Prestige System w/ Title(s) • Special Teleport Animations • Black Partyhat • Quick Prayers • Stat Adjustment Overlay • Bank Tabs • Amazing Home • Trivia w/ Shops • Shooting Star D&D • Squeal of Fortune • Donator Points Box • Higher Donations = More Privileges • Green & Blue Donator Skins • XP Locking • Switch between Old and new items look with ::switchitemslook • Active Staff • Active Community • Stable Economy • No Dupes • 24/7 Hosted VPS • Great PvP • Great Skilling • Great XP Rates
[b][u]Staff Ranks:[/u][/b]
Support: Spidey97 Torva Crimsonblade Kidd Baker 11 Spots OPEN
Moderator: Tony YoGi 10 Spots OPEN
Head-Mod: 1 OPEN
Admin: Chris 5 Spots OPEN
Manager: Bonesaw L
Coder: Xitra
Co-Owner: Jesus Christ 1 Spot OPEN
Owner: Kurtis

item.title: Infamous Dream 718
item.dc:creator: @RachelRSPS RachelRSPS
item.description:
@RachelRSPS wrote:

Welcome to Infamous Dream 718!

The staff and players of the Infamous Dream 718 community would love to welcome you to our toplist introduction page!
We hope that you like what you see and decide to give our server a chance to become one of the best.

Make sure to check out the Forums as well!

Webclient: Click Here https://www.rspscoding.org/play/?server=Infamous%20Dream%2024/7%20Need%20Staff
DL Client: Click Here https://mega.co.nz/#!wZ5UhCQK!AU3TIGPrtBMJgPLFy1nCwhNt8VUyNqvtEm1NQ94U8y0
Forums: Click Here http://infamousdream.enjin.com/
Guides: Click Here http://infamousdream.enjin.com/forum/m/20720735/viewforum/3916031

Here we are going to show you some features of the server.

Bosses

We offer a wide variety of common and unique bosses, we plan to add more bosses in the time to come so do not expect this to be the final list!

• Revenant Dragons - In deep wilderness rev cave.
• Ganodermic Beasts
• Mithril Dragons
• Sea Troll Queen
• Dagganoths
• Glacors
• Bandos GWD
• Zamorak GWD
• Saradomin GWD
• Armadyl GWD
• King Black Dragon

• Tormented Demons
• Corporeal Beast
• Nex

More to come!
